note.para: Consideration must be given to perishable cargo in affected zone (AFT Cargo).
Consideration must be given to perishable cargo in affected zone (AFT Cargo).

placard.para: Placard next to upper EICAS screen "AFT CARGO HEATING SYSTEM INOP - C/B PULLED ON P37" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Open and collar the AFT CARGO HEAT FAN circuit breaker on P37 (C-2) panel.
